document_data.name: Nrakka
document_data.mainbody:
Nrakka was a spell-slinging [[pterafolk]] who menaced [[Kir Sabal]] in [[Chult]] ''circa'' late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Birds sent you to fight Nrakka. Birds sent you to die!''|Nrakka}}
document_data.Description: Nrakka had a dark-green leathery skin with lighter aquamarine speckles and striping on the creature's feet.
document_data.Abilities: Nrakka was a powerful individual and had knowledge of the ''[[magic|arcane]]'', often showering its opponents with ''[[fireball]]''s from the sky.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, Nrakka took a habit of attacking inhabitants of the Kir Sabal monastery in Chult inhabited by a flock of [[aarakocra]] and several your [[human]] children. The bird-folk sought help against the cunning and cruel foe among with adventurers who carried to Chult investigating the ''[[death curse]]''.
